name: TheHotMinute
0:
”Alexa open the hot minute”
”Alexa launch the hot minute”
”Alexa start the hot minute”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the hot minute
Developer Terms of Use
des: The Hot Minute brings you up-to-date on the world of innovation and culture - hosted by the Founder and CEO of Silver, Shawn Kanungo. This high-energy flash briefing will be the fastest 60 seconds of your day. It’s also available in video format on all supported devices. Just say Alexa, ask The Hot Minute whats the latest to get your daily dose of awesome.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
